text_review: Very reasonably priced... salmon or tuna on rice bowl... sauces, fresh vegetable.... my friend is NOT a fan of rice, however, once tasted he really enthused...; Clean, friendly, a must for people that like affordable,clean and healthy food....

Saw Saigon Poke on facebook and was of course skeptical since it recently opened its doors. What a pleasant surprise! Im from California so we have some really great Poke restaurants and Saigon Poke is up there with the best. The environment itself is nice and the service is really attentive with the servers offering insight as to what combination suits your pallet most. This is especially important for new Poke consumers. For me Ive had it many times before so I went straight for the Norwegian Imported salmon bowl with spicy mayo and every topping. Salmon was out of this world fresh and went great with the spicy mayo sauce. Overall great experience. Been back twice and will be back often. A+++++

My first time trying poke. The restaurant is cute, great decorations and very friendly staffs. You can choose anything you like for toppings or can rely on their helpful staffs for a wonderful combination. Def come back !!!
I spent a very pleasant moment in this place, where I ate a very good pokÃ©! the food is very fresh and the staff is attentive.

Finally find some amazing healthy food in Saigon ! I didn't know anything about Poke, but the staff guide me through and gave me some recommendation. I don't regret trying ! the food was amazing and the fish was really Fresh !!; ; Highly recommend ! i will be back !

Fresh and tasty !; ; Feels nice to have healthy food in HCMC.; ; Staff is very friendly !; ; I came with friends, and although the place is a little hidden in the building, none of us had any probleme to find it
Great salmon and tuna poke in a very friendly place with nice staff. Definitely my new lunch HQ.; So tasty and fresh!
In a very nice environnement, with an excellent service, and fresh ingredients. I took the salmon POKE and It's was simply delicious. First time but not the last.

A really good discovery. I didn't know poke but I've found it really tasty. I live in Vietnam and it's hard to find places with fresh and healthy products. So definitely a must try if you like raw fish, salads, with a Japanese twist. The shop is also really nice, and the staff is friendly.

First Poke shop in Saigon! Despite being the first, they really do it right. The fish is so fresh and the sauces pair perfectly (spicy mayo!!!) So many toppings and they're delicious! The space itself is cool and chill. Seems geared toward girls who like fresh and healthy food. This is my new go-to spot!

First (and second) time we had a poke. We were not familiar with the concept, therefore I would like to describe it as a "create your own california roll in a bowl". Really nice and honest flavours. They use fresh ingredients and offer a friendly service, eager to explain each ingredient. Poke Saigon is hidden in an old apartment building with all kind of hipster boutiques, coffee bars and pop-up shops. They really stand out from their neighbours in cleanliness, quality and service.

I Went for poke, the 1st in Saigon and for the 1st time of my life. The place is very clean and cute. Staff were really friendly, and could advise on what to pick. Concept was kind of new to me but Absolutely loved it ! I love how poke gives you the ability to customise your bowl. It is very fresh, tasty, and healthy.; ; I Higly recommend this place.

Fresh and tasteful !!! I could have been in HawaÃ¯ ! It was my first Poke since a long time. It's good to finally have the opportunity to get one here in Saigon with fresh product. The staff is kind, helpful, they know their job ! I'll be back for sure; It was great !

This place is legit. I've tried poke all over the world and this place is way better than all of them. The fish is so fresh and clean. I recommend the spicy tuna. Their cold pressed juices are also delicious. This is my new favorite place in HCM.

Stumbled across this pretty cafe on the second floor of the cafe apartment. Tried the Chef recommended bowl and was totally surprised. Full of flavours and the ingredients were so fresh and refreshing!! Love the umami from the blend with the sauces! I've tried alot of Poke in Singapore but I think this is handsdown better. What a surprise and will definitely be back for more!

This is was not my first poke rodeo and it's tout this day one my favorite poke place.; ; First of all, I was surprised by how cheap it was given the type of ingredients available. They had tons of really interesting and unique options. I opted for a poke with salmon, ahi tuna, sriracha aioli, mango, masago, seaweed salad, and ogo seaweed. Everything was super fresh and absolute perfection.

If you want to eat great food, made from fresh products and for a good price in the heart of Saigon, don't hesitate. We went there with friends and had a great time. To add to the experience, the staff was very welcoming. I will definetely go back next time I visit Saigon.

Went to poke saigon because I wanted to have a nice alternative from sushi and other classic chirashis. I was not disappointed, everything looks (and tastes fresh) and you have enough topings choice that you can make a really unique meal that tastes unlike anything you've tasted in saigon.

I've heard about this address thanks to a friend, the restaurant is hidden on the Main Street into the second floor of the cafe apartment .When you come into Poke Saigon, you're first surprised by the sophisticated decorative and friendly atmosphere. And then you choose how to compose your bowl , the Chef is really helpful. I ve loved the fresh salmon associated to the crispy onions. So much flavors, so much tastes... and in the same time so healthy !!! I think I've composed the best bowl !; Highly recommended

Im a huge fan of Poke and have been waiting for a place to get my weekly fix since ive moved to Saigon. Im so glad this place has opened, i have lunch there about twice a week and started to use the delivery service for dinner.; I always get the mix brown rice/salad with salmon and spicy tuna, edamame, cherry tomatoes, radish, avocado and the onsen egg that makes it all so tasty.; The spicy tuna is full of flavour with a kick, the ingredients are always fresh - hits the spot every time!! Also love the upbeat and quick service staff!!; The place is small but charming and comfy, the staff is very friendly, and the service pretty quick!; Value-for-money wise it is definitely better than the poke places i used to go in Singapore. i highly reco this place to all healthy food lovers in HCMC.
Petit resto branchÃ© avec de bons produits frais et de beaux mÃ©langes de saveurs Ã  concocter.; La deco est top. Ã tester

DÃ©licieux ! Une bonne association de poisson frais, dâÃ©chalotes, de riz blanc, et des lÃ©gumes au choix... toute la fraicheur dans un bol rond et appÃ©tissant. L'ambiance du restaurant est trÃ¨s agrÃ©able, nous avons du mal Ã  quitter les lieux pour affronter Ã  nouveau la chaleur extÃ©rieure. Excellent endroit pour un dÃ©jeuner aprÃ¨s une promenade dans le plus beau quartier de Ho Chi Minh.

The moment I walked in, I was greeted by a sweet girl who explained, in perfect English, how the ordering process works. After telling her some things I wanted, she gave me recommendations and I LOVED my bowl! Both the girls were so sweet and friendly to talk to and the place had a great atmosphere. And fast wifi which never hurts!s
The food creation was eye catching , different tastes and structures combined into one delicious dish ,Fresh food fast and perfect service .

Lovely place running by lovely guys making awesome food ! You should try once and will come back surely !!!

I've never tried poke before so this was really a great experience! The staff was very friendly and helped us choose what we should put as topping in the poke. The poke costs 150 000 vnd which is a pretty fair price. The bowl is quite big portion but I eat alot so I couldn't get completely full though. Overall really great!
Came here on suggestion from the staff at a beer place ... So glad I made the effort to try it out! Great concept and delicious, fresh flavoured food. Spot on, very satisfying and top notch service

Nice and healthy food for your precious bodies for your curious mind if you haven't try before. There're a pretty wide varieties of toppings you can choose for your base ingredient so you just can't go wrong (unless it's the end of month and your salary payment hasn't come yet lol). Nice space but a bit small, hope you guys can expand your place in near future.; Comeback-ability: it's a yass.
Real clean and modern place. Owner was helpful in choosing the right toppings for my bowl. Also they deliver!!!!!
Super healthy option in Saigon. I am glad I found this place. The salmon were amazing. The staff were super friendly. I will recommend this to anyone visiting Ho Chi Minh city.

My first Poke ever and it was sort of weird to see all the mixing ingredients in one bowl, but heyyyy I coudnât believe it would taste THAT amazing. The word amazing doesnât do itâs justice. I had the California Package with Sushi rice and fresh Salmon. Perfect. What made it even more perfect was they even delivered it to my guest house the next day. Friendly people. I am surpriiiiiised! Thanks
Beautiful bowls that you choose yourself. Healthy fresh and tasty! It's in a beautiful building too, but doesn't have the view that other cafes here have.
The poke is on point. Fresh with all right textures. It's like a firework in the mouth. Need to be back here. Wished I could take this place home with me. Love love love

Poke (pronounced 'po-kay') has been quite a craze in Singapore and we're glad to find a joint here in HCMC. I find it a much wholesome version compared to the salad/juice fad since this is good quality, healthily prepared food that won't make you go hungry after an hour.; ; 150,000vnd (~6.5usd) is actually much cheaper than many of the famous salad bars in Singapore that we usually pay upward of 10bucks for. So each bowl of Poke consists of:; - good portion of Japanese sushi white rice/brown rice; - 2 ice-cream scoopfuls of tuna/salmon sashimi or cooked shrimp; - selection of Japanese sauces (our fav is the sesame sauce); - a whole range of healthy toppings... and you can choose all of them! For the sake of our preschooler, we only got the tomatoes, mushrooms, edamame, surimi and seaweed. The guacamole looked good at an additional 10,000vnd.; ; We were happy that our even preschooler liked and ate a lot of it. Not easy to please our picky eater so...good job. I also liked the friendly service girl. Hope that it can open up as a kiosk in D7 for the health-conscious families!

Maybe I've been in Vietnam for too long, but I felt this is comparable to what I can get in California if not better. Not only that, but the base price of 150k/$7 would be cheaper than anything I can get in the US. They rotate different toppings every once in awhile so it's refreshing to have new options. They make the fruit juice every morning with no additives, and they taste amazing. I'm grateful to have this as a healthy option because I don't get enough protein with my diet in Vietnam. The quality in the fish is amazing, the staff is friendly, atmosphere is nice, and the location in the coffee apartment on Nguyen Hue is perfect. Being the only poke place in Saigon so far, I'm glad the quality is top notch.

Its like a mix bowl of your favorite sushi, sounds a bit strange (or at least to me), but its actually very tasty and fresh. They're at very good price also for the quality you get. Staffs are friendly, and they can recommend you well. Will definitely be back!

I love everything about Poke Saigon! Healthy food, super tasty, creative menu, friendly staff and cozy place. The best place for a quick bite or a healthy lunch or a light dinner. I will definitely eat there once a week ;) Thank You Poke Saigon for coming to Vietnam!
First time having poke bowl. It was a perfect lunch with friendly staff and good atmosphere. Just follow the scooters to find the entrance on the second floor. No view of the city unfortunately.
Totally worth itfor the price you pay!.. Delicious food and friendly staff makes this wan to be a regular visiting spot..
There is just a little sing outside and it is hidden in a building but do not give up, it is totally worth it! Delicious poke!

Me and my group of ladies loved this new establishment. I wondered about what is Poke. Another edition of Pokemon Go? But no, the food is so amazing, fresh and delicious. Loved it so much. I came back on a Monday and it was closed??? I almost fell in depression... But the owner Manu was nice and helpful. They delivered out to d7 the next day which was so nice to eat with my colleagues. I will surely come back. And the staff and owner are sweet as Pokemon. :)

I'm a big fan of poke, so finding a poke place right smack in the middle of Saigon was a highlight of the day. The poke I usually have is well seasoned and chilled, but the one served here is mixed with the sauce / dressing on the spot.; 5 stars for freshness of ingredients but overall I was let down by the taste.
Stop by for lunch. It's in a very unique location and the flavor is amazing. You will not be disappointed.
The meal is super fresh and I like the vibe of that place! Feels good and relaxing specially in the city's heat. Definitely recommend it
Delicious food, generous portions and friendly & helpful staff! The place itself is also very cute and cosy. Definitely worth a visit.

Curious about this apartments building in Saigon that seems to accommodate multiple shops and restaurants, we ended up on the second floor at Poke Saigon. It is a lively and small place that serves delicious and healthy salads bowls and homemade juices. The concept is real simple as you can make your own pike with a base, fish or shrimps, toppings and a sauce. We really recommend this place for its food. The only drawback is the price as it is a bit on the expensive end for what it is. We paid 400k VND for two pokes and two juices.

After a long day of shopping I found Poke Saigon and it made my day! The food is amazing, fresh and you have lots of toppings you can chose in your bowl. I recommend 'the california' bowl with the sesame sauce. Also, the bowl is big enough to still your hunger!

The location is intriguing itself, inside a large multi-tenant building in the heart of downtown. Opt for the stairs and wander the building for more hidden gems AFTER you eat at Poke Saigon. One bowl is plenty for two people but indulge on your own and you won't regret it! We created a bowl with the help of the friendly and knowledgeable staff with sushi rice, salmon, assorted veg and wasabi sauce topped with guacamole, soy and fried onions. What a lovely, fresh and satisfying lunch that left nothing to be desired. We left satisfied and will definitely be returning for more. Great job Poke Saigon!
The food was fresh and tasteful, the staff is very nice and the overall meal was delicious !; Had a very nice time
Very recommendable: healthy, delicious, nice staff, cozy surroundings, comfortable interior and spacious!

Lovely fresh food. The enthusiastic owner took us through the process of creating our bowls then found us seating upstairs in a cool cafe / boutique. Definitely one of the highlights of our stay in Saigon.

This little restaurant is a hidden gem in Saigon. Located in Nguyen Hue apartment complex. With a great selection of fresh foods, this healthy alternative to the usual food found in restaurants is a nice new fresh and healthy way of eating. It's now a regular spot for both me and my wife. If you want fresh, healthy and delicious foods I highly recommend you give it a try!

Cool place with a simple but very delicious salad concept. You build your salad in four steps. The result is great.; ; Both adults and kids loved their salmon.; ; Craft beer and fresh juices to accompany the food.

We really liked the poke bowl with fresh and healthy ingredients. Definitely a refreshing alternative to the standard Vietnamese food!!; ; Also the staff was very nice and helpful!; Room interior is light, welcoming and cozy!

Poke Saigon zit op een plek die je niet gauw zult vinden, maar wat waren wij blij dat we het (dankzij tripadvisor) gevonden hadden! Super lekkere pokÃ© bowls voor een prima prijs en hele aardige, goed Engels-sprekende werknemers!
Lovely fresh food, healthy , really nice staff, strongly recommend Poke SaiGon, I'll come back for sure

I love this restaurant! My favourite from all the 9 floors of cafes available.; ; Clean, airy, relaxing ambience.; Modern deco with good lighting.; Great song list, A+; Spoiled for choices of seafood and sauces available.; Food is delicious and fresh. You get to choose multiple free toppings too.; Price is reasonable.; The store manager is very very pleasant. He can give you recommendation if you're indecisive.; Toilet is clean and with bidet installed.; ; There's no meat being served so its a safe option for those looking for halal meal. However they sell beer. So eat at your own discretion.; ; All around, great eating experience! Thank you Poke Saigon!

There's only one word to describe my experience : AMAZING! The restaurant is such a hidden gem in the heart of the bustling Saigon. The dish itself consist of so many fresh and healthy ingredient which I like the most. I am myself a fan of sushi so Poke is a really nice alternative whenever I crave the taste of sashimi. The staffs are also very friendly and they seems to genuinely care about their customers. Strongly recommend this place if you want healthy food or just simply want to discover new things. Will come back for sure :)

Being the first is always risky but as they say nothing ventured nothing gained. Poke Saigon was not only the first but also arguably has set the bar very high for the kind of quality any competitors would need to meet.; ; Poke Saigon is located in an interesting building, heritage, and can be somewhat difficult to find although it is located on the very popular and busy street Nguyen Hue. Seating is quite sparse as most of their business is takeaway or delivery via services like Vietnammm.; ; They offer a Subway style of make your own Poke bowls or try their pre-made choices which are all very delicious in their own right. I love that they never scrimp on toppings and often times the bowl seems way too small for the amount they give. (in fact i've told them to get bigger bowls). Great for vegetarians and health conscious people, they offer white rice or brown rice and salad as a base.; ; The options of tuna, salmon, or shrimp are always fresh never fishy. Always fresh. The veggies are always crisp, rinsed, and green. Out of all the ingredients they offer i've never seen a non-fresh one. Poke Saigon is about as good as it gets. They are planning on opening a D2 location and i hope also expand the variety of fish they offer. I order Poke once a week from these guys. Bravo!

I got salmon and spicy tuna and was so satisfied! It was fresh and delicious and the server (owner?) was extremely helpful and kind. Great little find in a building with 9 floors of cafes and boutiques! Fun to explore!

We had a great lunch here! You choose a base (salad, sushi rice or brown rice) and then toppings, including tofu, spicy tuna, salmon, edamame....; we loved it here, staff were friendly and the cafe was small but with nice decor making it a relaxed cool place for food.; Located on the second floor in a building on NguyÃªÌn HuÃªÌ£ it is very conveniently located for tourist spots.
Opted for a 50/50 sushi rice & salad base, topped with spicy salmon, tuna, spicy mayo, extra fish roe and lots of tasty veggies. Total 160.000 Äong. Yum!

Coming here regularly to let the Poke Team build my own bowl. Mostly going for Salmon, Tuna and Prawns. The protein, sauces and overall toppings are of very good quality.; ; Love the atmosphere in the place,and the awesome team.

Mann benÃ¶tigt eine kleine ErklÃ¤rung, aber das Prinzip ist doch einfach: Stelle dir eine Bambusschale mit frischen Zutaten zusammen, durchmische sie und genieÃe es. Die Auswahl reicht von frischen Tunfisch Ã¼ber Avocado bis zu Granatapfel. Dazu eine Auswahl an tollen SoÃen und GewÃ¼rzen. Das Ergebnis sieht nicht nur ansprechend aus, es schmeckt auch ausgezeichnet. Es kÃ¶nnte das lange erwartete gesunde fast food Konzept sein. Die Bedienung war dazu sehr freundlich und sprach gut englisch.
Very good poke, with fresh products ! It's a lovely place, located in an original building. I will definitely come back!

Hands-down the best Poke place, i've tried every other places and nothing ranks up to Poke Saigon, they have the widest variety of toppings and sauces (homemade, original sauces). Staffs are polite and enthusiastic, food is always fresh and well-seasoned. I'm a vegan and I always have their vegeterian bowl and choose a vegan sauce. Love it here.
Virkelig lÃ¦kkert! Man vÃ¦lge selv sin skÃ¥l med ris, laks/tun og sÃ¥ hvilke grÃ¸ntsager man vil have pÃ¥. Rigtig god betjening

Located in an old building, don't bother to take the elevator to 2/F as it's always full of people waiting, just walk up to the staircase. The male staff served us was very friendly and helpful, he explained every single ingredients and his recommendation. You can choose sushi rice/ brown rice/ salad/ half rice half salad; it's just similar to choose your food in Chipotle.; ; Sauce is good, love the shiso one (green sauce). Toppings given are generous too. Price should be VND150K for a regular bowl. It's a good option when you need a break from overwhelming Vietnamese food over the past few days.

fresh salad and rice with poke!; very healthy!; ; First, pick the base.; salad or rice(white or brown rice); or half and half.; ; then, choose your poke, sauce, toppings!; ; Make your own plate with fresh food!

If youâre a fan of pole then this is exactly why you would expect from a poke restaurant.; ; Itâs slightly hidden up a few flights of stairs but the decor is clean and relaxing and the poke is great.; ; They had tuna, spicy tuna and salmon options along with all the usual mixers and veg.; ; Highly recommend.

Loved this place. If you like poke you will too. Great food and service. No issue recommending this place.

Its on the second floor, go up the stairs and you will easily find it (I wasnt able to see their sign from the street).; I had the spicy tuna mixed with spicy salmon. Devoured it in no time!; Great pit stop to refuel before hiting the busy and hot streets again :)
Megaaaaa lekker! En ze legde alles heel goed uit. Zeker een bezoekje waard. De spicy salon was super lekker
Vers en heerlijke sausjes.; Vriendelijk en goed Engels sprekend personeel. Bij de ingang denk je wel... waar kom ik terecht, maar heerlijk gegeten laatste avondmaaltijd in Vietnam.

Het restaurantje zit in een groot gebouw met allerlei andere leuke tentjes. Het zit op de tweede verdieping dus prima te doen met de trap. Het is er heel hip en schoon. De poke bowl die wij hebben genomen was super lekker. Het goed Engels sprekende personeel legt je met alle plezier uit wat de opties zijn en welke ingrediÃ«nten en sausjes ze hebben. Een absolute aanrader als je wat gezonds wilt eten en wat anders dan Vietnamees.

This is one of my favourite place to get fast, tasty and cheap food. Each bite is so enjoyable and I can't get enough of the toppings and fish. It's a very trendy restaurant. Explosive flavours on my mouth has been a great experience.
I have lunch here, I find the food is quite good, the staff is enthusiastic, I will come back if I have a chance.

Read reviews on TA, as this was top listed in search for cheap eats. Went along to find it, not too easy but listing on google maps is quite accurate - you just need to look for the small sign on the outside of the old building then follow the motorbikes past their parking are and up 2 flights stairs.; ; You go in and order at the entrance and they make up salad, rice, raw fish mix aka Subway style.; ; The food itself is fresh and delicious. I would definitely go back. Easy food to prep but so nice and healthy.; ; Only down side is I wouldnât necessarily class it as a âcheap eatâ at 200k VND for one medium sized bowl and a beer (probably meant to drink fresh juice!).; ; But it was really enjoyable and the decor is pretty modern and looks very clean.

C'est le premier poke Ã  s'Ãªtre installÃ© Ã  Saigon....depuis l'offre d'est Ã©toffÃ©e. Mais Je reviens toujours Ã  celui-lÃ , il reste le meilleur.; Les produits sont frais, de qualitÃ©. Le staff est souriant, gentil.; Mais l'endroit est petit, et les quelques tables vite occupÃ©es.
I just tried the poke Saigon for the first time and itâs so yammi. So tasty and healthy at the same time. Not expensive and itâs really a good portion for 1 person. Definitely should try.

ä»äºã®ã©ã³ãã§ããè¡ãã¾ãã; èªåã§é¸ãã§ãé£¯ã«ä¹ããã ããªã®ã§ãå¾ã¡æéããªãã¦ãããã«é£ã¹ãã¦å¹çæç¾¤ã§ãã; å³ãç¾å³ããã¦ãç½ç±³ããã©ã¦ã³ã©ã¤ã¹ããã¼ããµã©ããã¨é¸ã¹ã¦ãã«ã·ã¼ãªã©ã³ãã«ãªãã¾ã; ; éé¡ã¯16ä¸VNDã»ã©ã§ãã; ; It's very healty and fast food.; I can feel like I'm in cafe at Hawaii even it's working time.; ; You can select 3 kind of rice, white rice, brown rice, half rice with salada.

This place is great for casual, healthy, fresh, non-vietnamese food. 150k VD (around 7 USD) for a bowl. Good for one normal person. Food is fresh and tasty, place is small bu clean. Staff were friendly.

I went there in the evening. It is not the easiest to find location since it is on the 2nd floor of a building and they do not have a neon-sign or billboard visible from the street. For those who wish to go there too: if youâre facing the bookstore itâs the entrance to the left.; Upstairs youâll find an industrial minimalist restaurant that is very clean. Staff is friendly and will walk you through ordering process. For 150.000 VND a bowl you can basically choose sushi rice/brown rice/salad or a combination as a base. Then you choose fish/seafood (shrimp/octopus/tuna/salmon. Last two are also available in spicy). Then you choose sauces (most of them are mayo based) then vegetable, fruit and herb toppings and seasoning as many as you desire (I remember edamame, onion, wakame, tomato, pickled ginger, mango, pomelo, mushrooms, horseradish, coriander, fried onions, fried garlic, sesame seeds, chili powder. I probably forgot about the rest, but this should give you a good impression of what they offer.; Freshly pressed juices and soft drinks are also available.; Everything is stuffed into a small bowl which makes tossing a bit of a challenge but perhaps thatâs just my clumsiness.; The bowl was really yummie.; I would surely go there again, although to me itâs more a lunch place than a dinner place.

First time today but will try and return before I leave Saigon.; ; Only reason I didnât give this place 5 stars is that itâs not well sign posted. Needed some directions to find the building. Then other TA reviews gave good clues.; ; You have to take a lift to the second floor from street level to reach Poke Saigon. They wanted to charge for using the lift so I took the stairs. Also they only serve fish to accompany your delicious salads which is a shame. Grilled chicken would be nice to see. Anyway the food was super tasty and not badly priced. Staff friendly.

TrÃ¨s belle dÃ©couverte de ce restaurant dont le concept est original, et dont les ingrÃ©dients pour composer sa salade sont bons, frais et variÃ©s. Le saumon est Ã  essayer ab-so-lu-ment !
Heerlijke poke bowl, plek beetje verscholen maar moeite van het zoeken waard. Allerlei toppings en mogelijkheden om toe te voegen, alleen de avocado miste maar was toch erg lekker.

Wir sind aufgrund der guten Trip Advisor Bewertungen gekommen und sind begeistert.; FÃ¼r ca. 6 Euro bekommt man hier eine wunderbare Poke. Auf dem Bild sieht man die Empfehlung California und weiteren kostenlosen Toppings (Seegras und Ingwer).; Personal ist freundlich, Restaurant ist schÃ¶n und sauber, QualitÃ¤t ist spitze.; Hoffentlich schaffen wir es noch mal dorthin :)

i ordered the Salmon with edamame, the salmon was pale and not fresh. same with the edamame beans. The dressing was very underwhelming and there was not enough sauce at all. The rice was dry and the sauce was barely enough to cover the produce ontop. Have tried this place twice now and both times have been seriously disappointed. not sure how this gets so many 5 start reviews

My wife and I were starving and were looking for a nice and quick place to eat. She, being a vegetarian, does not have many options for food in Ho Chi Minh City. We were looking for some options on Trip Advisor and this place popped up. It was only a few hundred meters from where we were, so decided to go there. The restaurant is part of a building which has many other shops. At first we walked past the building, but thanks for Google Maps we went back. There is a very small sign amongst many other signs in front of the building (so very easy to miss). The restaurant is located on the 2nd floor. Since we were extremely tired we decided to wait for the elevator. But after waiting 5 or so minutes we decided to just climb up. The restaurant was very fresh and looked new. There were several people sitting. We saw the menu and liked the idea of make your own poke. You could select from several mains, sides, toppings, etc.. The person helping us was really nice. I went with Sushi rice, salmon and spicy salmon (she let me mix my two scoops). The sauces were very nice as well. My wife went with their vegetarian option (tofu) along with several toppings.; ; The food tasted as good as it looked and we were extremely glad we found this place after our long and tiring day. The staff were extremely friendly. Food was ready in not time.; ; Highly recommend this place to anyone who wants a nice meal quickly.
Absolutely amazing! Clean, friendly, and the food is out of this world. If youâre looking for something healthy and delicious this is your spot!

Absolutely amazing - the food is decently fresh and delicious, they are too simple, we just choose what types of vegetables, proteins and toppings we love and put into a bowl.. Then enjoy with some kinds of sauces. the price seems to be high for a bowl of salad, but the quality covers everything. It's a must-to-go place for healthy eaters...; Recommended for breakfast or brunch. Should choose a mix of spicy tuna and soya salmon.. So great, and definitely comeback.

First time having Poke and this place surprised me. Located on 2nd floor in an old complex building in Nguyen Hue Blv. with nice decoration and cozy vibe. Friendly staffs that will introduce you how to make your own Poke (if you are a newbie like me). I had half sushi rice half salad for my base. Tuna and salmon which mixed together was a great idea. They have several kind of sauce but I go for Shoyu - Japanese soy sauce. Toppings were given generously. Outstanding quality! It's a huge portion if you're not so hungry. Me and my friend were stuffed. 150k for this healthy food is worth it.; ; If you're in Saigon and want to try something new, especially Hawaiian food, Poke will be my highly recommended.

I liked the idea of trying something new and my friend new the concept. I was a put of by the entrance. Service was friendly. But at the end of the day I felt the bill was really too much for just a bowl of fresh ingredients. I would rather go for sashimi style bowl and there are plenty of good ones in hcmc. My friend had been there already and had liked it, but not that much on the second visit, and was blaming his bad selection of ingredients.

Poke Saigon is hands down the best poke restaurant in Saigon. I struggle to find many vegetarian restaurants i actually like in HCMC and was pleasantly surprised by Poke Saigon. I have ordered way too many times to count in the last month, it is so addicting!
Delicious food and lovely staff. Went back two days running it was so good! Generous portions of fab healthy food.

First time Hawaiian sushi for me.; I've been here thrice in a month already. 150k vnd (7 usd/450 inr for one wholesome meal.; And it's located in the iconic Cafe Apartment on Nguyen Hue wallking street.

We were looking for something fresh & friendly, vegetarian friendly & different than pho. This is it! A bit hard to find. Look for the small sign hanging by the 42 on building. Walk past scooters up past lift & stairs behind lift two flights. Staff is very sweet, helpful & if you accidentally paid for the lift not knowing, they refund you if you mention trip advisor review. ;); My friend ordered the salad bowl with spicy & reg tuna with avo, seaweed, etc was about $9 American. My half salad half brown rice with tofu & veggies was delicious. The fresh fruit drinks were amazing. Small place. Plan to share tables & beat the rush of lunch hour. Theyâre very kind & helpful. We agreed our best meal yet.

Salad that you build yourself with only stuff that you like from a menu of fish and fruits. You choose a base of lettuce or rice or both and build from there.; ; Refreshing and easily our prettiest meal in Saigon in an airy cafe. You forget you are even in a city.

I loved this place so much that I went back three times just to get my pokes! The entire building is filled with restaurants and cafes, btw, you can eat and drink very well only by using this building (from the outside it looks like a normal apartment building but it isn't!).

What an amazing place! Tucked away and very quiet in the middle of the city. Lovely owner who helped us go to a great rooftop bar afterwards. The portions are very generous and you can pick as many toppings as you like, all of them just as good. Juices are sugar free and very tasty. After traveling for a while this was perfect for us, but also if you just arrive in Asia you canât miss this spot. Easily to combine with the war museum or go to the rooftop of hotel des arts afterwards!

i get home delivery quite often from these guys - it's always fresh, packaged neatly, and sent with a smile. today it was a whole 10 minutes later than they said it would be - they insisted on comp'ing my meal, wouldn't take no for an answer. they really care about their customers, so glad to see they're doing so well!
Really tasty, Instagram friendly meal  big selection of toppings and sauces. Would definitely recommend

A really nice addition to food choices in Saigon. Fresh, delicious, and one heck of a bargain; 150,000 VND (if I remember correctly) and you can pile on the food. Choice of salad or various rices, tuna, salmon etc and tons of other things to add. Choose what you want but you might as well take advantage of the offerings.; ; I now make an effort at least every fortnight to have a go. I recommend you do as well. Give it a try, you'll come away sated and happy!

Not easy to find, 2nd floor in a ugly looking building. But the place itself is very nice, tasteful und well designed. The food is fresh funny creative. However, it has its price! Quite expensive for Vietnam.

Very fresh ingredients, relaxing atmosphere and friendly staff make this place a great escape from Saigon's ever busy traffic. Not the cheapest place around (150.000-180.000VND), but definitely worth trying.

Have too much of usual and traditional Hawaiian meal? Then you should try this one: colorful, fresh, full of vegetables, vitamins, fibers; all will create a perfect acai bowl.; The place is decorated with a bit of vintage, a bit of modern and western style which will give you an interesting vibe. We went there as a small group of friends. All of us were so fancy by the way they display their "ingredients bar" and completely knocked out when looking at the dish. You can see through our pictures to know what we mean :); Long story short, you definitely want to put this place on your Must-try-list and experience yourself.; Have a great trip in Vietnam
Delicious lunch in a hidden restaurant in district 1. Highly recommend food and staff that greets you with a big smile

We went there yesterday. The restaurant is some how hard to find and you should ensure to have the address with you (the sign outside of the building is small). The pokes are small bowl filled with individual credentials (base of each bowl is either a kind of rice, salad or a mix of both). Everything is really fresh and not with too much oil.; ; Over all the meal and the atmosphere are some kind similar to a "subway" restaurant with Asian credentials.

I had never tried poke bowls before so I was excited to see how it is. The place was hard to find but definately worth finding! We came with two kids and even they for there siple bowls and ate everything. I would definately want to come again.
The best poke weâve ever eaten! Can highly recommend this place to everyone ! The sign outside is quite small and hidden, so you have to look carefully to find it!
The best place I have been for lunch in HCM, fantastic service, great food and great atmosphere !; Highly recommended !

We found this place on TripAdvisor and said we would give it a try. It was hard to find it since it is hidden in a pretty nasty building on the second floor. When you go in there you are unsure if you are going the right way but then you find the restaurant that is very clean and everything looks great.; ; It feels like Subway but instead of bread you have rice/salad, instead of chicken/ham you have salmon/tofu and then you have lots of salad to choose from. They also have their own juices. You can also get good food as a vegan which can be hard at other places in Vietnam.

Tucked away on the 2nd floor, away from the constant flow of Vietnamese scooter traffic, is the peaceful oasis of Poke Saigon. The choice of dining in either the indoor or outdoor space makes for a relaxing atmosphere. Since I eat Poke bowls quite often in NYC, I was excited to see that this Ho Chi Minh restaurant offered so many options. You get to pick your base (white rice, brown rice or rice with salad) then choose your protein; (several seafood options also tofu if you are vegetarian) plus many healthy toppings to chose from. Finally, finish the bowl with one of their delicious handmade sauces. This was my husband's first Poke bowl and he absolutely loved it. With 2 locations, it should be easy to make sure you include a trip to Poke Saigon when you visit Ho Chi Minh! The one we visited was 42 bis Ly Tu Trong, Ho Chi Minh.

We absolutely loved this place. Quite difficult to find but we were so glad we ate here. Poke bowls were incredible- sashimi was so fresh and plentiful. The bowls cost about $8 AUD. Service was amazing Thoroughly recommend !
This place is amazing! By choosing every single part of your bowl, everyone can be sure to love their food. Itâs simply delicious!

We were staying in HCMC just for two days. We were so lucky to find this place. Amazing food and service! We were pretty tired of walking all day and this place was perfect for a healthy fulfilling lunch and a place to cool off for a little while.
Great standard of fish and ingredients and charming place. Outside of the house shabby chic and inside suoer clean and cute. Staff is friendly and helpful. I will return here again

Decided to eat at Poke having read reviews on Trip advisor and I must say we weren't disappointed. There is a cafe like feel to the place with a very simple, clever concept for serving you with delicious and healthy food. I am reticent to call this a fast food place because everything on offer is healthy and very fresh, but it is important to note that because of the concept, food is served fast. I found the prices quite reasonable for what was on offer and the two staff members on duty the night we were visited were extremely courteous and efficient.; The place is not obviously located, one has to go into a narrow building and climb up two flights of stairs to get to restaurant. There were some people trying to charge you an 'elevator fee', don't pay for it, just take the staira. The 'elevator fee' had all the signs of a potential scam but I can't say for sure.
My partner and I had a joyous experience here. It was our first time trying poke and after trying this I will go no where else. Such beautiful presentation and quality of food. Really cute spot too.

Everything is simple, good and cheap. You can compose your bowl yourself or order one of the suggestions. I ordered the Saigonese suggestion, then added a little guacamole, some choped green onions and parsley on top of that, a watermelon juice to complete all that, and it was perfect.
It was a very special food experience. The ingredients were all from a high quality!! It was very delicious and the staff was very nice with perfect english.

What a good place to go. So unique and delicious, you can choose Jap rice and veggie, then add tuna and salmon, finalize with topping like mango, seaweed, ginger, etc. Only 150.000VND and you are full. Very good. Highly recommend.

Have been here twice, more than enough, lots of vegetables! Would definetly advice going there for a change with the Vietnamese kitchen! Nice staff aswell. A little more expencive but still okay! (150k)

What is there not to like about Poke Saigon. Simple concept, healthy and tasty food, funky atmosphere and a nice staff. Could be set in Soho and you wouldn't see the difference. Bit tricky to find, need to enter a building and go up to the 2nd floor. Don't be tricked into paying for the elevator, just use the stairs
wow is the only word, very nice food and extremely tasty, very easy to find as it is close to our hotel.

Il ristorante Ã¨ localizzato all'interno di un condominio prospicente la via principale di Saigon ovvero Nguyen Hue, la caratteristica di questo condominio (prima residenziale) Ã¨ che Ã¨ stato lentamente trasformato (legalmente??) in una serie di caffÃ¨, negozi ecc molto interessanti.; Uno di questi Ã¨ poke saigon, abbastanza ben frequentato soprattutto a mezzogiorno serve una serie di insalate da comporre a proprio piacimento. Pur non essendo io un vegetariano ed non essendo un appassionato di insalate l'ho trovato un ottimo posto dove pranzare tranquillamente.
Vous devez y aller , trÃ¨s frais, dÃ©licieux et pas cher !; ; Jây suis allÃ©e deux fois dans la mÃªme journÃ©e tellement que jâai aimÃ© Ã§a :)

Escondido en una segunda planta, ambiente tranquilo y limpio. No se puede pedir mas a un sitio para comer una ensalada tranquilamente. Precio de la ensalada son 175K Vnd, hay una amplia variedad de ingredientes para hacerla a tu gusto. Muy recomendable. Ãnico problema, no disponen de baÃ±o dentro del establecimiento.

Ze duiken opeens overal op in Nederland, de poke bowls. Nooit eerder geprobeerd maar in Ho Chi Minh liepen we er tegen aan. We vonden het heerlijk, je kunt voor een paar euro je eigen bowl samenstellen. Het zag er allemaal vers uit en niets is te gek. Personeel legt het netjes uit en is heel aardig. Locatie is top!
Vahva suositus, ruoka oli erinomaista ja palvelu nopeaa. Ravintola siisti ja raaka-aineet olivat tuoreita.
Siisti ja hieno mesta hassusti rupuisen rÃ¶ttelÃ¶n keskikerroksissa. HyvÃ¤ kohtuuhintainen murkina, joka valmistui nopeasti.
Hier hebben wij geluncht en het was heerlijk! Wel even zoeken om het te vinden, maar het is het zoeken waard!

Ne cherchez pas une terrasse sur le trottoir mais plutÃ´t lâentrÃ©e dâun parking avec un petit panneau indiquant le 2eme Ã©tage.; ; Nourriture excellente grÃ¢ce Ã  la fraÃ®cheur des produits et aux mÃ©langes que vous composerez vous-mÃªmes ! On recommande aussi les jus de fruits et la Â« craft beer Â» TÃªTÃª!
Simply Delicious. You can take all extras for a reasonable all inclusive price. Staff js exceptionally competent, professional, friendly and lovely. Highly recommended
C'Ã©tait chaleureux comme restaurant et trÃ¨s bon! Le service est agrÃ©able et l'ambiance est calme, ce qui n'est pas nÃ©gligeable dans cette ville qui ne s'arrÃªte jamais!
Simple concept and fresh ingredients that mesh well together, healthy and tasty with a nice atmosphere. Absolutely brilliant.; ; It feels like sushi + bibimbap and it works wonderfully!

Hatte Hunger und hab auf Tripadvisor geschaut. Gesucht war etwas gesundes und ausgefallenes. Poke Saigon gefunden, war zwar 1,6km entfernt, habe mich dann trotzdem auf dem Weg gemacht und wurde nicht enttÃ¤uscht! Service super, kÃ¶nnen flieÃend Englisch und helfen dir auch, falls du nicht zurecht kommst und schmeckt zudem noch bombastisch! Preislich liegts bei 150k Dong ~ 6â¬, also liegt total im Rahmen :) Wirklich nur empfehlenswert

Concept original, dÃ©coration sympa. DÃ¨s salades Ã  composer ultra variÃ©e avec Ã©normÃ©ment de choix, on arrive Ã  la fin avec une trÃ¨s jolie composition qui met dÃ©jÃ  lâeau Ã  la bouche. Et le goÃ»t est bien au rendez-vous. Mention spÃ©ciale pour le poisson Ã©picÃ©

Twee ontzettend lieve meiden hielpen ons een heerlijke Poke bowl samen te stellen. Voor omgerekend bijna â¬ 6,00 heb je een rijkelijk gevulde bowl met heerlijke verse tonijn of zalm. Een feestje om te eten!; ; Wel even Google maps gebruiken om er te komen ;-)
En hÃ¤lsosam bolw med fÃ¤rska frukter, fisk och god dressing. Simpelheten Ã¤r riktigt imponerande och passar verkligen med stÃ¤llets stilfulla miljÃ¶. Perfekt lunchstÃ¤lle fÃ¶r alla tillfÃ¤llen!

å¨å¾æç¹è²çä¸å¹¢å¤§æ¥¼çäºæ¥¼ï¼ä¸å¤ªå¥½æ¾ãåæ¥å¼çï¼æå¯¿å¸ï¼æç±³é¥­ï¼åå¯¿å¸åç±³é¥­æèè¬èï¼å¯ä»¥ä»»æç¹ï¼ç¶åå éèï¼å¾æ°é²ï¼é±æ±å¾å¥½åï¼ä½æ¯å é±¼ä»çè¯è¦å é±ãæ¤°å­åçæ¯è¾è´µ

Comment prÃ©senter Poke comme le premier du classement lol. ..trip advisor est vraiment Ã  la ramasse sur ces classement . C'est une saladerie qui se dit hawaienne (?), avec une seule formule. ..choix d'une base ,salade-riz, et un grand choix de legumes et sauces supplementaires , c'est bien fait, Ã§a ne peut pas etre mauvais et c'est relativement pas cher mais surtout c'est servit par trois jeunes filles souriantes dynamiques and friendly et Ã§a Ã§a fait pour bcp dans ce petit endroit, oÃ¹ les tables sont vite occupÃ©es. ..n'hesitez pas au 42 Ã  entrer dans le couloir sombre garage Ã  scooter et monter au deuxieme Ã©tage.
Fantastiskt koncept och fantastisk mat. Bra service som dessutom kunde engelska. Denna resturang ska man inte missa.
Allez y sans probleme. C'est super propre et bon.; Par contre il faut etre attentif pour trouver l'entree ;)

Me and my SO decided to try out Poke after our city tour and saw it on tripadvisor. We weren't disappointed. The 2 scoop bowl is a generous amount, toppings are fresh and go so well together (if you don't know which to take, take everything ;). Price is around 150k to 200k, depends on the toppings you choose. Decor is nice and cute, the place is right in the center, easy to find but still away from the loud street outside. Bonus the instagram-worthy visual. So worth it!
I have tried this restaurant very fortunate as past by and saw many people inside and decided to try it really good food.
On our 1 week visit to Ho Chi Minh my friends and I visited 3 times. Amazing food. Would recommend for vegetarians and glutenintolerant.

First night in Saigon and we went for Poke?; Yup we did.; The TA reviews about a sketchy entrance is correct. Thru the line of scooters to the .... pay elevator. ( tip walk the 2 floors) to a bright clean small restaurant; We were enthusiastically met by 2 young women who walked us thru the menu.; We chose 2 fishes. assorted go withs and a couple spicy sauces. Sat down and totally enjoyed.; My wife is not a big eater but she finished everything and announced we were getting another. We did... we ate.... we enjoyed.; Fun change of pace.; Update: Actually went back 2 days later. Same , same. Fresh and good
Fantastic food .... hidden gem in a apartment block. Fried garlic and onions a must add on! Highly recommend!
We went there because it was number 1 on TripAdvisor and we werenât disappointed at all. Fresh and delicious food and frendly staff. It was not even crowded at 6:30 pm.

I sometimes find salad bars a bit pretensive. This one has a dirty, strange shared staircase entrance behind a motorbike covered parking area used by other cafes. Quiet difficult to find. The place itself is on the 2nd floor at the back of the building. It's small, with smiley pleasant staff, clean and not cramped. The salad bowls are made to order with some helpful suggested combinations. The food is tasty and well put together to the extent that you might put up with the shortfalls of the building. I struggle to agree that it is one of the best restaurants in HCMC however. Well worth looking out for if you are in the vicinity and need a break from the hustle and bustle. I think the salad bowls are 150k vnd.

Very nice place with great fresh food. So nice to get a different kind of food here in Vietnam, when youâve been eating the same kind for days.; Fresh vegetables and very tasty fish. I tried the salmon with spicy mayo and it was delicious
Very good thanks; Fresh ingredients , a lot of combinations possible, never disappointed, a classic !

This was my time trying Poke and I have to say it was absolutely worth it. This place has a great atmosphere and the food is so delicious. I'm very glad we had the chance to visit Poke Saigon and chow down on this amazing food!

Excellent food and healthy to boot. Def worth coming here although itâs hard to find.; Just go in the alley right beside the kinokunia bookstore and go to the 2nd floor. The alley might look dodgy but thereâs nothing to worry about.; Enjoy the food.

My daily gourmand meal. My all-time favourite healthy eating place.; Excellent and Consistent quality in terms of: food, service and ambient.; Thanks for bringing this lifestyle to Saigon and inspiring more people to live healthier in the enjoyable way.
My first poke experience, and I'm blown away! Lynh was amazing in helping us choose. Forget about sushi, this is the next best thing!

A great alternative. I'm not a big salad fan, but I do love sushi. This place was recommended to us by a local friend. And it was well worth the visit. The staff were lovely too, taking us through the options.; ; A nice change from the bustle of the streets.

First time trying out poke, but as a fan of sashimi, I just had to stop by. Was fun picking and choosing my base and toppings (which were all super fresh and delicious), giving the place a great return potential and a way to placate picky traveling companions. Great way to have a tasty vegetarian meal as well, if that is more to your style!
Great quality. I just order a poke to my office and it was very good. Really tasty, very good vegetable and salmon quality!
You can't go wrong with a good poke bowl, and this place got it right. Kind service in English and with a smile, various toppings and yamy sauces!
One of the best food i had in Vietnam, althouth not Vietnamiese. Young people doing what they love, Poke..interier, dishes, everything super fresh and tasty
This was the tastiest, healthiest, most wonderful meal we had in 2 weeks of delicious food in Vietnam.; Spend the extra buck or two for an extra scoop of fish or tobiko!

I first knew about Poke Saigon back in 2017. Was skeptical at first but first bite and I was blown away. Fell in love with Poke, hasnt got back since. Quality and fresh ingredients, wide range of quality mix-ins - you will really notice this once u try other pokes offered elsewhere in town. The only complaint is that the portion is too big for me, yet it doesnt change the fact that Poke Saigon taste deliciously amazing and I keep coming back for more. Check out their 2nd and also bigger, better designed location on 42 Ly Tu Trong.

Definetly a meal 8 mentioned throughout my entire stay in Saigon. It was so delicious and looked so healthy also. The staff was friendly, making it easy for you to create your own dish. Try it!! Wonât regret it for sure
One of the best lunches we had in Vietnam :); The food is fresh and there are many options of toppings

I visited this restaurant in February 8th. I am from korea and I dont have experience to visit this type of restaurant. But all staffs are very kind and speak in english very well.. I and my friend are very sacrificed. Thank u for all staff, we enjoyed excellent food.

150,000vnd per bowl is actually very expensive for the food they offer. Also at the first few spoons, i found the food was delicious, but then i quickly fed up with the food. Maybe because my options of the sauce?! Then the guava juice they sold was over ripped and tasted old. This might be an interesting concept, but it doesnt deserve to be no.1 restaurant in Ho Chi Minh city on TA.
Definitely the best spot to get a healthy meal in Saigon !; ; One of the best Poke Bowl I've tried - really fresh ingredients, neat presentation; ; Professional and friendly service; ; A must try !
Echt super fein!; War tatsÃ¤chlich nicht so einfach zu finden. Eingang 42, dann mit dem Lift (oder Treppe) in den zweiten Stock.; Die Auswahl ist gut und alles top frisch.

Donât worry about climbing the stairs to get to this lovely little gem. Walk past the motorbike parking and climb to the second floor to enjoy the amazing treat that awaits you. We both had one of their pre set bowls of goodness and it was all wonderful.; ; Go, enjoy, and live the fresh and light fare.

Op 100m afstand van ons hotel lag Poke Saigon.; Het was even zoeken maar dat was zeker de moeite waard. Wat was dit lekker! Twee dames legde keurig in perfect engels uit wat er allemaal mogelijk was en wat betreft smaken het best bij elkaar past.; Zeker een aanrader voor lunch of avond eten!

Angelockt von den Empfehlungen in TripAdvisor haben wir das Poke gesucht und gefunden. Was gar nicht so einfach ist, da der Eingang wenig einladend aussieht. Der selbstzusammen gestellte Salat ist extrem lecker. Einfach mal was anderes.

2 pokes, 2 GetrÃ¤nke fÃ¼r 360.000 Dongs. Ist zwar recht viel fÃ¼r vietnamesische VerhÃ¤ltnisse aber Preis/Leistung stimmt absolut. Noch teurer wÃ¤re aufgrund der sonst recht gÃ¼nstigen Preise zwar nicht gerechtfertigt, allerdings kann man sich das Essen definitiv mal gÃ¶nnen! Satt wird man auch und die Vielfalt an GeschmÃ¤ckern ist echt klasse.; Wir wÃ¼rden immer wiederkommen.

Wir haben heute zum ersten Mal Poke gegessen. Es war SEHR lecker! Uns wurde freundlich geholfen bei der Zusammenstellung des Gerichts. 150â000VD ist nicht sehr gÃ¼nstig fÃ¼r Vietnam, aber das Essen war wie gesagt sehr gut. Was wir hingegen schade finden ist, dass eine kleine Flasche Wasser 20â000VD kostet. DafÃ¼r bekommt man sonst 1-2 grosse Flaschen. Wir wÃ¼rden trotzdem wieder gehen.
Stedet her er helt sikkert et besÃ¸g vÃ¦rd, hvis man trÃ¦nger til et afbrÃ¦k fra det klassiske asiatiske kÃ¸kken! Servicen og ingredienserne var i top.

TrÃ¨s bien pour le prix et sa situation gÃ©ographique, il ne sâagit pas dâun restaurant avec service Ã  la table mais câest trÃ¨s frais et abordable. Le thon et le saumon Ã©taient succulent et le choix dâaccompagnement est trÃ¨s variÃ©!

Das Poke Saigon liegt etwas versteckt, ist aber definitiv einen Besuch wert.; ; Das Personal hilft einem sehr gut bei der Zusammenstellung der Bowl und lÃ¤sst einen auch alles probieren.; ; Das Essen war super lecker, die Zutaten waren frisch und anschaulich angerichtet und auch von hoher QualitÃ¤t. Geschmacklich war es einfach super!; ; Ich habe 150.000d gezahlt und bin davon absolut satt geworden. Die Portion ist ordentlich. Der Preis ist fÃ¼r vietnamesische VerhÃ¤ltnisse zwar hoch, bei der QualitÃ¤t aber absolut gerechtfertigt.; ; Eine absolute Empfehlung von mir!
150.000 dong for a bowl is a little on the expensive side but definitely worth it. Tasty, fresh and big portions. We came back three times during our stay in Saigon and were never disappointed!
It was hard to find at first but search was rewarded with nice Hawaiian bowl of fresh veges, tuna and chili sauce.

you can create your own poke bowl by your self from many choices on the board. The ingredients were so fresh, very healthy and absolutely tasty. the staff greeted me and my friends with a big smile, they were so warm and professional. I really highly recommend you guys should go to here and try them all once in your life

Nice selection of fresh ingredients but don't arrive too close to closing time as food selection will be limited.; The bowl is well sized for a wholesome filling meal and it is well priced.; Clean, Small, and well run restaurant with Friendly service.; Health juices like Beers are available too.
Very delicious food and great staff, price totally OK. Possible to create every Pot by His own or use advices from the menu.

I really enjoyed my food here and the ordering experience. There is so much to choose from, and the staff is very kind, they will give you suggestions if you arenât sure what to pick. Everything looked and tasted fresh, and the price was definitely reasonable. If I am ever back in Saigon, I will be back for sure!

I love this place. I have been lots of times since I found it. It's about Â£5 (150,000VND) for a bowl of poke so reasonable but not as cheap at the street food. I usually go once a week. The food is fresh and very healthy.; ; The venue is located about 2 floors up and initially you may miss it from the street and you have to walk up some dingy stairs to get there. However once up, there are many restaurants and small boutiques in this complex.; ; Definitely recommend if you want fresh healthy food. It now has a sister restaurant on Ly Tu Trong street, which I actually prefer now. Just feels brighter inside but essentially the same.
This poke bowl was amazing, i would recommend everyone that visit ho chi minh to eat there! And the staff is so lovely

Visited this cafe for an early dinner, after having some trouble finding the cafe due to a powercut in the building, the food went over and above our expectations! It was healthy and absolutely delicious! We all decided to create our own poke bowls but there are a few choices on the board if you just canât decide what you want in your bowl! The staff are wonderful, so happy and friendly! Would totally recommend this cafe to anyone visiting Ho Chi Minh City!

Great latest discovery, and not something fusion, trendy, overpriced, etc like so many new restaurants opening in Saigon.; If you're hungry and don't want heavy food, this is the perfect place.; No oil, no msg, no bad meat, no dubious hygiene, no wrong order, no sweating, no queue, etc. just HEALTHY ingredients in your bowl.; It's tasty, it's filling, it's beautiful, it's healthy.; A lot of choices of bases, fishes, sauces & toppings to motivate future visits soon!; The staff is very helpful and charming (2 ladies when I visited before evening closure!).; Highly recommended :)

My husband and I live in Hanoi and make weekend trips to HCMC frequently. Every time we are in HCMC, we visit this place at least twice. I love the food! It is so healthy and a refreshing change from other food in Vietnam. I highly encourage people to try this place! You will not be disappointed.

We were looking for a light lunch and saw this restaurant was highly rated and near our hotel.; ; The reviews are accurate, this is a great place to have a fresh and tasty meal. The menu is limited to Poke Bowls and some fresh juices but it is an excellent place to get fresh and fast food.; ; The kids loved their salmon and shrimp, my wife and I shared a tofu bowl and thought it was excellent.; ; The walk up the stairs to the third floor is a little sketchy but worth it. Also, the elevator had a sign that there is a charge to ride it so we took the stairs. Not sure if they really collect the money but there is also a sign that most restaurants will refund the cost.; ; Although hard to find, glad we found it!

My boyfriend and I had become sick of the street food in Vietnam and were in desperate need of some healthy food. We were greeted with big smiles and served fresh and delicious food which hit the spot for us!

I loved this place! You pick your own rice, fish, salad and sauce in a very delicious combination. And you get a lot of food for a low price. The staff is very helpfull and kind and we have been there at least two times a week. The only negative thing I can find is that there are too few tables for a lot of people. And the place can be a little difficult to find because you have to pass through a parking of motorbikes and it doesn't look like a place for restaurants..; Please visit - you will not regret!

This is excellent salad bar with plenty ingredients to choose from, with very friendly and helpful staff. It is very clean and the food was so fresh and delicious. The entrance to the building is terrible and you have to go to second floor through dirty staircase, but it is worth it.
This place is a hidden gem, and the pitaya bowls are a must-try if you go here. Very refreshing, tasty, and healthy. The poke here is also great with fresh ingredients.
Great food, super nice staff and nice atmosphere; All of our family enjoyed the visit and we're already talking about when to come back

This bowl was everything I wanted and more. Fresh ingredients and no heavy feelings! Only healthy. Great variety and toppings to customize. Incredibly warm customer service. Friendliest service I've had in SE Asia.
Really great poke bowls and fresh made juices. Cheap and healthy. A bit difficult to find the restaurant, look up! 2nd floor :-)
I love sushi from a place called Nudo in Manchester, England.; This was like my dream sushi-salad in a bowl.; So glad I visited! I'll miss it when I'm back at home
Ate at Poke Saigon in D1 this afternoon. Delicious sushi and salad bowls with many choices of base, ingredients and toppings available. Also has great fresh-pressed juices and fresh coconut water.

This is absolutely a great place hidden away in a stairway full of nice places to eat.; Very nice and helpful staff serves a beautiful poke bowl where you are able to select your own ingredients.; And they also have very fast delivery service.; A must if you are in town.

æåç¬¬ä¸çé¤åå±ç¶æ¯å®¶æ¥æ¬å°é£å ï¼è¿èå¨è·¯è¾¹éå¼ç ´æ§çå±æ°æ¥¼éï¼ç«éé¹°ä¸å¯¼èªæ¾ç¤ºçé¨çå·52ï¼å®éæ¯42å·ãåç¢ç±³é¥­éºä¸äºé¢å­è²çæµ·é²åç§å°èï¼è¤ç´ æ­éï¼è¥å»è¶çº§ä¸°å¯ï¼ä¸ç¢15ä¸è¶åç¾ï¼å¾å¥½æ¨èã

This place is my favorite place to eat in the city! I live her for 2 months and honestly eat at poke saigon 3-5 times a week. The poke bowls are amazing, and the price is not bad! The staff is also amazing. RECOMMEND, RECOMMEND, RECOMMEND!!!
Le top du top! TrÃ¨s cosy avec un personnel adorable! Les pokes sont trÃ¨s bien prÃ©sentÃ©s et les ingrÃ©dients de qualitÃ© . Je recommande vivement

Ist zwar nicht das gÃ¼nstigste essen aber unglaublich lecker und willkommene Abwechslung zum Schluss unserer Reise. Sehr frisch und lecker gesund wÃ¼nschte so ein laden gÃ¤be es bei uns wÃ¤re der mega Trend und im Gegensatz zu den Berliner MÃ¶chtegern LÃ¤den geschmacklich ein Highlight.

I love Poke but think it's silly it's ranked #1. Don't get me wrong, the food is super fresh and delicious and the atmosphere is bright and clean and hip. Staff are kind and attentive.; ; I recommend the second location on Ly Tu Trong, it's always empty (and is a larger space) compared to the Nguyen Hue location which is always crowded with a line. This will definitely fill you up and is a solid low carb meal.; ; I recommend the California bowl (half brown rice half salad) with everything (spicy) and some fresh Pineapple juice. I believe a bowl and a juice will run you 200k ($8.50 USD). Will continue to return. Highly recommended. Mahalo.

Saigon hat in den HinterhÃ¶fen urbane Kleinode. Im Fall von Poke muss man durch einen recht ollen Eingang im hinteren Bereich die Treppe in den 2. (Oder 3.?) Stock nehmen. Der Fahrstuhl kostet 3000 VND! Es gibt verschiedene CafÃ©s, Sushi-LÃ¤den etc in dem Haus, die alle sehr hip sind. Essen war toll, Portionen sind nicht riesig, aber ausreichend!
Iâm not sure what all the hype on TripAdvisor is for. Not cheap for Vietnam and average flavors. Was super busy and they got one order incorrect.

This was my first Poke experience ever, and let me tell you it couldn't have been better!! I loved everything about the bowl I created. The ingredients are fresh and delicious, with many options to personalize your Poke, from fresh veggies, to the variety of sauces, to the delicious fish. The staff are extremely friendly and eager to help you with the whole process, making sure your bowl is made exactly to your liking. We also tried the Pitaya bowl, which was every bit as satisfying, full of fresh fruits and topped with delicious banana, coconut, oats, and chia seeds. Certainly made with love. I just went yesterday and I am already itching to go back!! Definitely highly recommended to give it a try during your time in Saigon.
Fabulous poke bowl!; You can go there straight if you have the chance to have a trip in Ho Chi Minh City

It is probably the best salad we have ever had. I am really donât know how to say it, just try it by yourself. Itâs not easy to find,but once you are there you are about to be in the Number 1 salad place in Asia. The staff is soooo friendly and the food fresh and healthy. Thumbs up for this Restaurant.
Whilst we had a bit of trouble tracking this place down it was really worth it. The Poke was outstanding as was the service with it. Very filing for a good cheap price. Highly recommend.
Really great fresh food, was delicious. We werenât sure if a bowl would fill us up but it definitely did, and great value at Â£11 for two bowls and two drinks.

The place looks bright and airy. The staff were helpful in explaining the ordering process, ingredients, etc. The ingredients were fresh and serving was generous. No wonder the place was full at 3 in the afternoon.
The food is amazing! Healthy and refreshing eat.; ; The building is deceiving in its looks from the outside, I had second thoughts whether we had the right address.

A great spot for some fresh fish and an abundance of flavour! Not a big Poke fan but this place changed my mind.; ; It is a little hard to locate. You have to go down a little alley way to an elevator and take the stairs up a couple flights. The alley access is just next to the book store. There are no signs but donât get discouraged, itâs worth the search!
Super good & Friendly people; We were at 42 Bis Ly Tu Trong 1st Floor; Quiet & Nice place.; Good food, also for vegetarians!
å¥½åçæµ·é®®æçï¼æåè¦ªåï¼åæ­¡æµ·é®®èåé®®çé½æåæ­¡ã; æ³ä¾åºç¨é¤åå»ºè­°åæ¥é»è©±è¨ä½ã; æå¾éå¾ä¸å¥½ææå°è¢«èéæå¾äºã
Min kÃ¦reste og jeg spiste her, og det var super lÃ¦kkert. Personalet var sÃ¸de til at hjÃ¦lpe os, og de havde nogle virkelig friske, lÃ¦kre rÃ¥varer!

This place is a little hard to find, but the reviews on TripAdvisor were so good I simply had to go there. I wasnât disappointed! The salads were so fresh and I had some delicious salmon with mine. The meals are excellent value and the staff are great! Go there :)
Ausgezeichnetes Essen und sehr freundliche Bedienung.; Der PokÃ© war sehr frisch und geschmacklich eine Wucht.

A hidden gem right in the center of Ho Chi Minh. Fresh food, great service, you can really taste the freshness of the ingredients. A great getaway from the noise of the city. Will definitely be back soon.
Came here twice. Portions are large even for me. Extremely healthy with a huge variety of foods in your little bowl. 150,000 dong, flat rate (unless you get extra).

I ate my first PokÃ© ever here and loved it ! Itâs all fresh ingredients that you can choose and the staff is explaining everything for you and prepares your own lovely bowl. Itâs not the last time I am going to be here !

At poke they have one of the best food I have ever eat til now. In a small bow they'll bring us everything we want for the price of 150.000 VND, not expensive for that amout of rice, salad, topping and sauce. IT IS REALLY TOO MUCH, it may look small but when you eat, 2 person can finish that bowl but still bring you completely full, But you will ask for more. The staff is super friendly and nice. They're good at English too. Come to PokeSaigon, you'll know what I'm talking about. Again They are amazing!!

Nie nie szkodzi przy tej okazji znaleÅºliÅmy innÄ restauracyjkÄ z lokalnym super jedzeniem!
Delicious and special. Shrimp is highly recommended. If you are confused by the kinds of selection, please refer to the âour recommendationâ. I chose the Saigonese . Perfect!
Yeah. It's salad and raw fish. New trend is very trendy. Not sure why everyone excited about basically a salad but it's good for salad.

Het is even zoeken (het restaurantje ligt boven achterin in een gebouw en op de deur staat het niet aangegeven) maar dan heb je ook wat. Heerlijke poke bowl met lekkere verse ingrediÃ«nten. Het personeel is super vriendelijk en het restaurantje ziet er erg leuk uit.
Fantastisk mad. Indbydende og friskt. Super sÃ¸dt personale.; Dejligt med noget mad der ikke kommer direkte fra en friture som meget andet ellers gÃ¸r her i Vietnam.

This place is quite difficult to find; located in the cool building on Nguyen Hue St, but well worth visiting! The Poke was absolutely amazing, staff really friendly and atmosphere cool. Our favourite lunch in Ho Chi Minh!
A bit hard to find, but it's definitely worth searching! You get a lot of food and it is all delicious. The staff is very friendly.
Loved my food and the service. Fresh salad and fish that tasted so good. The portions are reasonable too. Nice atmosphere and friendly staff.
With the hot weather it was very refreshing and the food is delicious, no matter what combination you go for. The place itself is very cute, simple yet stylish.

This little shop is located at the 2nd level of an unappealing and old building.; ; I was hesitated to enter in the beginning. When you have accessed the building, please take the upstairs if you don't want to pay 3000 dong for using the elevator <please remember it is on second floor only>; ; Regarding my meal (the california and coconut water), rice bowl is nice and has many various topping for you to choose from. However, I would pefer going somewhere to enjoy the coconut water (taste below the normal standard)..; ; Nevertheless, the rice bowl is very budget friendly and worth trying (don't expect any Woo factor) In addition, there is very limited seats available in the shop. So try to avoid visiting it during busy hours. Another good thing about this little shop is they have a good hygenic management because my very sensitive stomach can tell.
Best poke in Saigon. Fresh food and delicious. Delivery very efficient, fast and on time. Always concern with the costumers. Congrats for all.

It was my first time to try poke and it is lovely. They have fresh ingredients and all of them are well prepared. The staff is friendly and helpful. If you get confused since there are too many options, they have some sets for you on the board.

Had never heard of this style of food before but saw it on google and the pics looked amazing so tracked this place down. The food did not disappoint it was great so fresh and tasty. The staff were so helpful taking me through the order process. Really relaxed and cosy atmosphere perfect place to chill and have great food
The food is so tasty and fresh. Everything is clean and the staff are very nice and helpful. A lot of selections. Highly recommended
Food is okay but drinks didn't come with ice. I didn't like that the place did not accept credit card payment, which is troublesome when you don't carry enough cash around

Found this little gem tucked away thanks to TripAdvisor. Took a bit of looking to find it as itâs tucked away in a little alley. Donât bother taking the elevator though as the stairs are right behind it.; ; The poke bowl was wonderful. Wasnât expecting a whole lot, but the flavors went really well together. I went with the California, which was great, but I would skip the tomatoes. The salmon was really fresh and the toppings really finished it off. Made for a great lunch after a trip to the tunnels.

Had a shrimp and salmon bowl. Was absolutely lovely the fish was fresh and delicious. As were all of the ingredients. They give you lots of options to choose from and if you don't want to do that they have some recommendations on the board for you. Bit pricier compared to other places in Vietnam, but all the ingredients are high quality and fresh and you'd easy pay about $20 for this in Australia

This place was really hard to find for us. You had to go into a building and up to the second floor. However it was so worth it. Iâm a fan of poke bowls and this one was one of the best I have encountered. A little more expensive than most cheap eats in Vietnam, but certainly not overpriced. Highly recommended
Attendant is attentive and well verse in English conversations. Place is easy to find with assistance of google map. Meal is fresh and clean.
Really cute restaurant and the poke balls are so fresh and loads of variety. The staff are really friendly and help you choose the best sauces to go with each ingredient!

Loverly staff, great English language capabilites. Food selection was very big, great for vegetarians and they even cater for vegans. I wolill defo be coming back here, nice seating area and chilled music. A bit difficult to find but go upstairs to like the 3rd floor and you'll find it!

This was hard to find at first but there is an alley into a building next to a bookshop. Go in there and take the stairs up (it costs for the lift). You will find Poke! You can choose from their set menu or create your own. Everything was fresh, healthy and tasty!! The restauraunt was clean, bright and fresh with simple but nice decor. A great find and exactly what we needed!!
This is the first time I have ate at Poke Saigon.; It is very interesting. The food here is delicious. The staff is also friendly.; I love Poke Saigon. <3

We had a great Poke bowl here. The staff were so helpful in explaining what we could have in our personalized bowl. Lots of choices and really delicious!! You can choose your own fillings or there are a few signature bowls. Not too hard to find, find the bookshop, go up the little lane next to it, up the stairs and follow the signs. Really worth a visit if you love poke bowls.
Good healthy food and good service. They have many variety of food. We will definitely come here again.
a MUST in ho Chi Minh. Poke was great and the girls were so helpful. Everything was fresh and tasted great. I would recommend 100%
The most nutritious and lovely food we have had in Vietnam. After 2 weeks of Vietnamese food we were looking forward to a fresh salad and it was sensational. Highly recommend
Very fresh, so delicious and nice staff. Everything was perfect. The store is not easy to find but it is worth. Go there and take a fresh bowl with healty ingredients. Also the juice was very tasty.
The food was made very quick, fresh ingredients and very friendly staff - highly recommended if youâre looking for a fresh meal while in Saigon. Will come again!
Great location, hard to find but within this old house with the other stores and restaurants really cool, lovely food, very good price, lovely Service
Super cool place with great food. Unassuming building entrance, but the restaurant itself has a great atmosphere. Wouldâve rated a five if they accepted credit cards.

Un large choix de produit frais et de bonne qualitÃ©. L'endroit n'est pas trÃ¨s grand mais extrement agrÃ©able (mÃªme pour rester travailler un petit peu). Le service est top ! Comptez 150 000 vnd pour un bol

Nogle gange syntes man bare om sushi, uden at gide alt den dypperi og de alt for smÃ¥ mÃ¦ngder. Her kan man heldigvis fÃ¥ en helt skÃ¥l sushi. Der er det hele, ris, frisk rÃ¥ fisk, soya og mayo, og alle de ekstra ingredienser man kan finde pÃ¥.; ; Jeg var selv lidt skeptisk da jeg hÃ¸rte konceptet, men pÃ¥ en eller anden mÃ¥de fungerer det bare. Koster 150k per skÃ¥l, sÃ¥ helt billigt er det ikke, men det er klart det vÃ¦rd - bare oplevelsen i sig selv er god, men maden er uovertruffen.
Serveuses trÃ¨s sympas et attentives. IngrÃ©dients frais et goÃ»teux. Un large choix disponible. TrÃ¨s bien situÃ©
