I love pokÃ© & this charming little shop (tucked safely away from the hustle & bustle) did not disappoint! Ingredients were all fresh & offered great combination. They have a nice range of poke/fish items & the largest selection of toppings â¦
Hidden away upstairs and down the hall, this place is super cute. Itâs chipotle style fast casual make your own poke. The staff are really friendly and the food is delicious.

Hidden gem! If youâre craving for a good pokebowl, this is a must-go. Very good quality and friendly good english speaking staff. A bit hard to find but itâs totally worth it. You can put unlimited toppings and they also have nice juices and pitaya/smoothie bowls  â¦
such good food and great service. just 150.000 VND for a bowl (drink not included). I definitely recommend this place! the picture is of "the california"
Vegan and vegetarian options available; I only came here to keep my vegan gf happy but I absolutely loved it.; Construct your dish yourself (think Subway on crack, but no bread) â¦
Taste of Hawaii in Saigon. Very fresh and delicious. Vegetarian friendly. Highly recommended.
Lovely fresh food, lots of flavours. A beautiful meal and wonderful service. Very friendly staff who will guide you through building your perfect poke.
The best place for poke and the cutest place of the city. If you go there you are sure eating high quality dishes and extremely fresh ingredients. Enjoy!
Very delicious in my kind of taste and the best thing ist, all bowls can be gluten- and lactosefree.
The food are fresh, most of things are healthy, a great choice. The staffs are welcoming and helpful in explaining for new comer like me everything
Perfect poke with good service! Staff can speak good English too! 90% of their clients are foreign!
Super clean place with great healthy food and lovely people! A nice place to escape from the busy streets.
Perfect : delicious, balanced, healthy, good quality, clean and quiet environment, wonderful staff, etc.
Very tasty  Staff is great and speak English very well. Definitely going back next time I go to Saigon. â¦
The best poke I ate! Very nice stuff, polite and helping! Really recommend
Excellent Poke place. Very quiet and nice. Fresh tasty and healthy meal. Rare combination of this three features in one thing.
Delicious light meal, you can choose what you want here. By the way, you need to find the store first before you eat XD

We were impressive with this concept in another building and wanted to discover the second one. The food was still delicious as if we could eat everyday. The staffs speak English perfectly and are really polite. 150k for one bowl with everything you can choose, fresh and healthy!
Delicious pokebowls at a reasonable price. Lot of options for your bowl as well.

The place is a bit hard to find, but the premises are quiet and lovely decorated. The staff is English-speaking, very friendly and will help you create your own bowl with rice or salad base, various sea food and toppings. The price is a bit â¦

Had lunch here and it was very good. A lot of different ingredients to chose from, rice, salad or mix of both as base, salmon and tuna, natural or spicy, shrimps, octopus, etc. and a variety of different dressings. â¦

I had never had poke bowls before coming here... It was so good. So fresh, ample size. I asked for heaps of toppings and they just loaded if up. Shrimp was a highlight of my bowl. If I was her in Saigon longer I'd be back to eat again :D
Unbelievable good bowl, was better than in Hawaii! And a lot cheaper ;)

The place is a bit hard to find (go up through the parking garage) but the food is very good! You are free to customize your pokebowl any way you want and there are many options available. If you're unsure about what to get the staff is very helpful and willing to make some recommendations. Enjoyable place all in all.
Our first time trying poke and it was delicious! The ingredients are so fresh and the staff is super friendly. Great English too! The smoothie bowl is also yummy!

Simply delicious meal! The staff were very friendly and spoke English very well. They were happy to explain and give recommendations based on my preferences. It's more than enough food, and only AUD$9. The food is fresh, colourful and tastes amazing. Air con, WiFi, cute couches and benches,  what more could you want?

Amazing staff, relaxing place. The concept, the quality of meals, or drinks that are suggested just WoW, really simple but so good, love it this is for the reason i went back after a friend show me the place for a lunch. Really amazing idea, quality, staff all match together for a reasonnable price. Keep going, will be back, YummY
Great place. Great and fresh food. The staff are super nice and speak great English.

Truly a wonderful place with AMAZING attentive staff, delicious food and a cool environment! I will certainly be back. Weâre vegans and the vegan options was perfect! Shout out to Mai Linh for making the whole experience even better :)

Great food and many selections to choose from. The salmon was very fresh, and the wasabi Mayo had a good kick to it. Although a little hard to find, it's definitely worth the visit. Super friendly staff.

We have spent a very good moment at this place. The bowls are very fresh and delicious. Special thanks to Thanh the lady who served us tonight. She explained to us the menu carefully and was very nice
Super delicious fresh food and amazing staff!!
Beautiful little place, fresh ingredients and amazing customer service: thank you !
Omg!! So delicious! And the serving size is soooo generous. Very fresh, def be back daily until I leave! The girls are all so friendly and gave me tips on places to go. 10/10 for sure!
Fresh and delightful bowls and a super friendly staff

Great place, super friendly staff. The gentleman who served us told us this is the better location out of the two as you can sit down here to eat, the other one is very busy.; Had free WiFi too.
Hidden on the first floor after you pass the scooter garage. Amazing Poke bowls reasonably priced. Everything fresh and delicious. The staff speaks english!
I love this place. Chic and chill. Healthy delicious food. They're located upstairs, level 2 even though the sign on ground floor says located at level 1. Under 200,000vnd per bowl

Delicious and great value! Best poke bowl I have possibly ever had. Clean and airy too, highly recommend!

The food is absolutely amazing, the place so cozy and friendly (even if it is a little tricky to find as it is at the 2 floor of a building that seems a parking) and the staff probably is the best thing, welcoming and helpful! Must try!

bit pricey but staff is very helpful and for the fixed bowl price you are free to choose from all ingredients they offer which is super cool
This was the best poke I have ever tried. Delicious! Thank you. And also very polite and friendly staff here. Definitely recommend this place.
As a tourist i was quite comprehensive about eating here as it is not quite authentics. But this is hands down the best food i ate here in vietnam. I bet this is one of the best poke in the world

An amazing gem in Saigon, not easy to spot but that adds to its charm. Fresh bowls of awesome flavours, the perfect stop for lunch.

Super tasty!! I got a vegan bowl and the staff was pretty aware of what was vegan or not. They were super helpful and friendly.
Fresh poke ingredients, great variety, lovely staff, cute little seating space, oh and they deliver to. My go-to for comfort lunches, any day.
Focuses a lot in foreigners, so if you're a Viet, you'll get treated a little... "less". But hey, otherwise it's great for travelers, expats, foreigners: food is never bad, good services.

Delicious and fresh poke bowls! The place is beautiful and cozy, and the staff is helpful and super nice! Definetely recommended!
Best poke bowl I've ever had!

A certain old building, walking up the dark stairs, only to see that there is a hole in the sky! Beautiful night with extremely healthy food, sitting in the simple and beautiful decoration, great enjoyment. For 180,000, you can choose two kinds of meat with a variety of ingredients, and the CP value is very high!
Stylish establishment, very friendly staff with good knowledge of English.; The products are fresh. Good size portion, I couldn't finish it, took half of it home. â¦
Super delicious and healthy bowls, also to design yourself!; The prices are not cheap, but you get a decent portion and won't be disappointed :)

As a local in HCM, i wouldnât know this beautiful place like this, i kept looking for something authentic dish for my body to feel light and help me in shape, and i found this place. I swear, the price is affordable and fresh like morning.; I had a poke bowl which is kinda basic as i remembered, i ate in January but now i have a chance to recommend to everybody who on the way to eating healthy, trying to get fit. Love the flavor, the waitress is really helpful that guide me to choose the topping, and she gave me a complementary drink while i enjoyed the bowl.

Worth a trip here! The poke bowls are so fresh and tasty! Try the home made fresh juices too! Staff a very friendly. Would definitely recommend, I have tried lots of Pokeâs all over the world as this is one of my favourites!

War eine leckere Bowl, die ich aber ehrlich gesagt gÃ¼nstiger erwartet habe, bei einem â¬ Zeichen. Location ist auch cool, auch wenn man das Restaurant erstmal finden. Gut fand ich das man nicht auf eine Anzahl an Topings begrenzt war sondern man viele nehmen konnte wie man wollte. Es gibt viel Auswahl, auÃer wen man keinen Fisch mag, dann wirds knapp, den es gibt nur Falafel und Tofu.

Take the lift or walk up a few flights to find Saigon Poke.; ; The food was very fresh and delicious.; Portion size is great. You chose your base, protein, sauce and as many topping as you want. This came to 140k, which is just under Â£6. Tofu was the veggie option.; ; The waitress was also really helpful!; ; You can sit in or take away.
Super Bowl, sehr gesunde und frische Zutaten. Hygiene ist sehr gut. Atmosphere ist auch gut. Schwer zu finden, lohnt sich aber definitiv
Very delicious and fresh bowls, very nice staff. To find at the 2nd floor, you habe to search a little bit, but definitely worth!
Me and my fridend really enjoyed our food and liked that you could choose as many toppings as you wanted. Also the price was very good so we were really happy and would definitely go here again!
My first time here! It was awesome, and the food was super! You get to pick and choose what you want which was great!

I am a lover of Poke so my expectations are high and this place far exceeded them.; ; It is all about freshness, from the great attitude of the team, to the assortment and to how the bowl was out together.; ; If you want to snap some excitement in your mouth, this place will do, I recommend the Spicy Tuna, but everything looked so good.
The poke bowl are fantastic here. You build your own bowl to your liking.The restaurant is very clean and food is fresh . I would high recommend eating here.
We visited poke Saigon this three times this week. We loved it! Fresh food, amazing go taste and the service was fantastic. The workers are very nice, we loved them so much and that why we came back!

I obviously live on another planet looking at the other reviews. I went today for lunch given all the hype but for me it was good but not amazing. Their located in The Cafe Apartments on the main Walking Street in Saigon (second floor). Small branch, limited seating. Think wooden seats, beach vibe Hawaii. I stupidly went at peak period lunchtime 13:00. Suggest going outside of main mealtimes. I luckily got a seat. You can eat in or take out. The line was long with two members of staff who were trying their best. More a place to eat and go rather than linger for ages. There were only two suggested 'ready-made' options. None appealed to me. I think if they have more ready-made choices, lines would be less. Most people like me made their own bowls which obviously took longer. Those that went for the suggested ready-made standard options were a lot quicker. Choose your base, I had salad which was lettuce leaves and then your toppings. There was a nice variety of toppings. What made me laugh was they had already run out of salmon! It was only 13:00. This is the most popular poke! They had other marinated salmon but I wanted the plain salmon so did others! I was surprised. I had tuna then. The regular option is two scoops which is enough. Just be mindful and make it clear if you have dietary restrictions. Staff were not very clear on this. Toppings ranged from mango to crab salad and quail eggs! Ingredients were fresh but some of the lettuce leaves were turning brown. Some toppings had an additional cost and if you choose quinoa as a base, this was also extra. They actually weigh the poke! My bowl was light and healthy as I chose the salad and avoided the heavy sauces and toppings. If you have the sushi rice, the portion size is generous and it will be quite filling. The bowls were well presented and pretty. Instagram lovers will have a ball! There are spoons or chopsticks to eat with plus soft drinks and water. Not sure about alcohol or tea. The fresh watermelon juice was to die for. So good! Better than the poke! No sugar and 100% juice. Really refreshing. It isn't cheap but poke never is. Staff try their best to keep the place clean. It was nice but this was definitely not the best poke I have eaten. I would recommend going but I wouldn't say this is like a top poke place having travelled much of the world. They don't accept AMEX. Would suggest looking online or at instagram before going and deciding on your toppings to make it easier. It's easy to get carried away otherwise!

Kind of hard to find but the food was great and the decor was really cute. A perfect place to get out of the heat for a while and have some super yummy PokÃ©.; It wasnât the cheapest but it was worth it. I had the California bowl and Iâm still thinking about it the next day.; You need to walk through what looks to be a moped garage, head up 2 flights of stairs and youâll see the sign to head down the corridor.

It was a rainy night when I came here to have dinner with a potential business partner. He said he wanted to eat something exotic, but did not have a taste for the spices of more nonconventional cuisine. To be honest, it was quite bothersome of him, but thankfully, I knew of this establishment and we dined here that evening. Needless to say, my business partner and I were quite satisfied with our experience, especially with the atmosphere, which was a nice change of pace from the local hustle and bustle. If I had to mention one bad thing, though, is that it's not quite the best environment for business dealings, as both of us were to engrossed in the food, haha. Truly one of the restaurants of all time.

Though I loved the Vietnamese food on my trip, by the end I was craving fresh, healthy light food. So I was happy to find Poke Saigon. It's inside an old apartment building on the 3rd floor. When I went it was during lunch hour so the wait was a bit long. And by the time I ordered some items were sold out like the spiced tuna. There's a lot to choose from - raw salmon and tuna, crab meat, veggies, choice of rice, salads, sauces. Too many choices! It's not the cheapest of meals (190,000) but will definitely keep you full for awhile unlike Vietnamese food where I'm constantly hungry! You can also get it packed to take away if you can't finish it. It looks like a small bowl but it's quite substantial!
The food here is very fresh and the design here is very nice. I will be happy to come back here when I can.
